userdoc.notice: This is the purchase incentive vault for staking buyer tokens.         Users first stake their buyer tokens and wait for distribution.         About every 24 hours, the reward will be calculated to users' account.         After disrtribution, users' reward balance will update but they still need to manually claim the reward.
